website_summaries.verdict: A top choice for best unique shot glasses that are well-made and distinctive.
pros: Customers love the unique print of mug shots on the exterior of these glasses
We love that these are fun and interesting as well as high quality
They get top marks for use when entertaining
cons: the graphics may come off over time or if soaked in water

customer_reviews.title: Great nostalgic set
customer_reviews.text: Classic shot set, bought as a gift. It had sentimental value, as we had these shot glasses since just out of high school. Most of them had broken, except for one, so I was really happy to be able to find a new set to replace it with. The glasses do not hold up if dropped (tested 5 times by accident) and need to be hand washed to preserve the decals.
customer_reviews.author: Catheren

customer_reviews.title: A must have for your shot glass collection
customer_reviews.text: 5 stars for this product! Bought this as a graduation gift and was not disappointed at all! Thick sturdy glasses, beautifully designed, I reccomend this gift 100%!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sykes

customer_reviews.title: The graphics are pretty good. The box is cute
customer_reviews.text: These shot glasses are really cute! The graphics are pretty good. The box is cute, good for a gift. Only 4 stars because my first order had one shot glass missing. My reorder was great.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Best Shot Glasses Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Shot glasses can’t get cooler than these! Nice thick glass, feels like quality, and the mafia idea is just awesome. At $17 this is a steal. Got these for the new house and I absolutely have no regrets! Easily giftable to anyone, and I mean ANYONE! Everyone will like these.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift/Collectable
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect for a gift or to collect. They are very unique! A few of the pictures on the glasses are crooked but it's not terrible. My husband loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Sepeda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect decor/gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to use as decor for my boyfriend's 30th birthday (mafia themed) and for him to keep as a souvenir after. Shipping was fast and it came perfectly packaged. No cracks, rips or bending of the actual box, and each shot glass was in its own bubble wrap sleeve. I didn't have any issues with duplicate shot glasses or any damage. Everyone at the party thought these shot glasses were so cool and unique, I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla M

customer_reviews.title: Compliment Magnet!
customer_reviews.text: These are very well made shot glasses. Got them as a christmas gift for my best friend and he couldn't have been happier. He doesn't even want to use them at all. Also, we have been using some basic shot glasses and you could definitely tell the glass was thicker with these and the shot almost came down smoother- strange. Get them!
customer_reviews.author: Authman

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: My son collects shot glasses and this is a neat little addition to that. The info on the glasses seems to be accurate. Just really happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Beautiful Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These shot glasses are one of a kind. They are beautiful and came packaged with care. Even when put through the dishwasher, the mug shots don't fade or peel off. Great quality for a great price. Customer service was excellent and I would love to purchase these again for future gifts :)
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my uncle came complete no broken pieces exactly as pictured and worth the money going to look great in his man cave!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa mendez

customer_reviews.title: Check inside box before gifting
customer_reviews.text: I bought the set as a gift. The quality of the glasses are excellent, however, it was not a complete set. The box did not have the Machine Gun Kelly glass but had 2 Pretty Boy Floyd glasses. The person still seemed happy with the gift but it was a bummer to not have the complete set as intended. I would still recommend the set, just check box before gifting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great conversation pieces!
customer_reviews.text: The mug shots arrived nicely packaged and are better than what I expected. These are a Christmas gift for my son to display in his bar. I know he will enjoy them! Not sure how I stumbled upon these, but will definitely order more from UPG!
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Big hit at my party!
customer_reviews.text: These shot glasses are so cool! Everyone at my party loved taking our shots with them and fought over who got which one😁They were perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Cyber Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Shot glasses are nice
customer_reviews.text: Box was pretty banged up which is a bummer as this will be going to a collector. Was going to send back but its to close to Christmas and I need it.
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Grab Gift/Not Anymore!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for an upcoming Christmas party this year and when they arrived, they were just to cool to give away. So I kept them for myself and will be ordering something different for the grab.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Father's Day Present!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool. My hubby was upset that I didn't get him a shot glass of a gangster when I was in Chicago so I took to the Web and found these. They are so cool. I love the list of their nicknames and crimes on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my husband and he loved it. Turned out to be a great conversation piece as well. Definitely a bonus that it arrived sooner than expected.

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift idea!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a fun gift idea! I got it as part of a gift for my husband and he loved it. He showed it off to his friends which made me feel like he really liked them. Sometimes its the little things that make a great gift!

customer_reviews.title: 2 of the same glass/missing one
customer_reviews.text: My BIGGEST and most FRUSTRATING things is I got 2 Machine Gun Kelly and I didn’t receive John Dillinger!!!!!!! This makes it hard to give as a gift!! This makes me very upset cause now I don’t have the complete set!!! All that being said I do LOVE these shot glasses!!! They were wrapped individually inside the box.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Great Gift! Noting was broken and the print was easy to read

customer_reviews.title: Great but not dishwasher safe
customer_reviews.text: This was my 3rd set of these because the lettering and image fades to nothing in the top rack of the dishwasher. Though it was me or the type of detergent or a heat setting. Nope. I really like this set but not about to hand wash these. Now I have 6 clear shot glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Issues with Product
customer_reviews.text: I got these to give as a Christmas gift. Unfortunately two of the shot glasses were the same and I am missing pretty boy floyd. One of the shot glasses was also chipping along the rim, making it dangerous to actually use. I was quite disappointed as the other reviews were mostly positive!

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift idea

customer_reviews.title: Loved this!...and so did my brother!

He was very excited and happy when he opened it on Christmas. He loved it and so did I. All the shot glasses were smooth and clean, and all the text on the glasses were clear and easy to read.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!

It will be easy to distinguish who's shot glass is who's from now on. I definitely recommend these to anyone looking for a fun a classy addition to their bar or man cave.

customer_reviews.title: John Dillinger would approve! :D

And I promise you the more you drink the funnier it gets that you're literally starting at each of their mugshots while drinking out of a mug.. shot! ;)
customer_reviews.author: jennamarie

product_meta.title: Mug Shots - 6 Piece Shot Glass Set of Famous Gangster Mugshots - Comes in a Colorful Gift Box
product_meta.description: This handsome set of shot glasses features mug shots of six of America's most notorious gangsters. So now you can down a bourbon with Pretty Boy Floyd, a Sambuca with Lucky Luciano, a schnapps with Bugsy Siegel, or a Jell-o shot with John Dillinger. Each shot glass has a front and profile mug shot of a famous gangster, along with his rap sheet. For instance, Lucky Luciano's rap sheet includes murder, racketeering, drug trafficking, and mugging. The set comes in an attractive box and includes Al Capone, John Dillinger, Bugsy Siegel, Lucky Luciano, Machine Gun Kelly, and Pretty Boy Floyd.
feature_bullets: Features mug shots of six of America's most notorious gangsters.
Each shot glass has a front and profile mug shot of a famous gangster, along with his rap sheet.
Includes Al Capone, John Dillinger, Bugsy Siegel, Lucky Luciano, Machine Gun Kelly, and Pretty Boy Floyd.
Includes six dishwasher safe 2 oz. shot glasses packaged in a fun colorful gift box.
Click on the link to our store page near the product title to see more smart and clever gifts. UPG truly has presents of mind.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars680 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
